body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Sweet Delights Bakery. My name is Brian Roberts. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Brian, my name is Emma Bennett.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Emma. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm actually a bit surprised and upset about the customer service I received yesterday.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm very sorry to hear that, Emma. Could you please tell me more about what happened?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I placed an order for a birthday cake, but the staff was quite rude when I went to pick it up.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for that experience. Could you provide me with the date of your order and the name of the staff member you interacted with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I placed the order on October five, and I believe the staff member's name was Jessica.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Emma. I'll look into this matter immediately. I appreciate your patience.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Brian. I hope this issue gets resolved soon.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Emma. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Have a great day!
